title: Set Fire To The Rain
lyrics:
[intro] (Dm) (F) (C) (Bb)
 
I let it (Dm)fall… my (F)heart
And as it (C)fell… you rose to claim (Bb) it
It was (Dm)dark… and I was o-(F)ver
Until you (C)kissed my lips.. and you (Bb)saved me
 
My (Dm)hands… they were (F)strong
But my (C)knees… were far too weak (Bb)
To (Dm)stand… in your (F)arms
Without (C)fall into your feet (Bb)
 
[pre-chorus]
But there's a (Bb)side to you that I (Dm)never knew, I never knew
All the (Bb)things you’d say, they were (Dm)never true, never true
And the (Bb)games you’d play, you would (C)always win, always win
 
[chorus]
But I set (Dm)fire to the rain
Watched it (C)pour as I touched your face
Let it (Bb)burn while I cried
Cause I (Bb)heard it screaming at your (Gm)name, your na-(C)ame
 
When I (Dm)lay… with (F)you
I could (C)stay… there… (Bb)close my eyes
Feel you're (Dm)here… for-(F)ever
You and (C)me together nothing is (Bb)better
 
[pre-chorus]
But there's a (Bb)side to you that I (Dm)never knew, I never knew
All the (Bb)things you’d say, they were (Dm)never true, never true
And the (Bb)games you’d play, you would (C)always win, always win
 
[chorus]
But I set (Dm)fire to the rain
Watched it (C)pour as I touched your face
Let it (Bb)burn while I cried
Cause I (Bb)heard it screaming at your (Gm)name, your na-(C)ame
I set (Dm)fire to the rain
And I threw (C)us into the flames
When we (Bb)fell something died
Cause I (Bb)knew that that was the last (Gm)time, the last ti-(C)ime
 
[bridge]
Sometimes I (Dm) wake up by the (F)door
And heard you (C)calling, must be waiting (Bb)for you
Even (Dm)now when we're already (F)over
I can't (C)help myself from looking (Bb)for you
 
[chorus]
 I set (Dm)fire to the rain
Watched it (C)pour as I touched your face
Let it (Bb)burn while I cried
Cause I (Bb)heard it screaming at your (Gm)name, your na-(C)ame
I set (Dm)fire to the rain
And I threw (C)us into the flames
When we (Bb)fell something died
Cause I (Bb)knew that that was the last (Gm)time, the last ti-(C)ime
 
[outro] (Dm) (C) Let it (Bb)burn (Gm-C)
Let it (Dm)burn (C) Let it (Bb)burn (Gm-C)
(Dm) [end]
